text: [Ej pajomʙar, ʙa muşrikon] Bigū: «Liʙos [-u zinatho]e-ro ki Alloh taolo ʙaroi ʙandagonaş padid ovarda va [hamcunin] rūzihoi pokizaro ci kase harom kardaast?». Bigū: «In [ne'matho] dar zindagii dunjo ʙaroi kasonest, ki imon ovardaand, [va agar ci kofiron niz az onho ʙahramandand] rūzi qijomat maxsus [-i mu'minon] xohad ʙud. Mo incunin ojot [-i xud]-ro ʙaroi gurūhe, ki medonand, ʙa tafsil ʙajon mekunem
